subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] evp bit
author: Jody Cupp
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0040_01C6A36F.FAD1F940
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

From my experience, I get better evps if I'm holding the tape recorder in m=
y non dominant hand (left). I think our energy is used to help make the con=
nection, if it's harder for them to get through.  

Sometimes that is not n=
eeded though, and I've heard awesome class A's while the experimenter was n=
ot even present.  But again from my experience I have better luck if I play=
 a part in the session.

Jody
  
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Am=
y Swanson 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 09, 2006 3:4=
8 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] evp bit



  lol thats funny
  the other nigh=
t i was recording in my room the first time while i was asleep using a tape=
 voice recorder, and i had the tv on to a hispanic music channel, but got n=
othing ont he evp lol

  awsome info ty

  amy

  Jody Cupp <bigrig309@i2k.=
com> wrote:
    Amy,
    Have you tried using music (not vocals) playing so=
ftly in the background when you record?  I'm hearing "use music" at the beg=
ining when I did a light noise reduction.  Music really helped me as I was =
getting my feet off the ground.  It recharges you, the room and even helps =
them form their voice. You'll want to play something soothing and relaxing =
to you.  This could be anything from a guitar solo, classical or any medita=
tion type music.  What ever makes you feel good is what you should use. :)
=
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Amy Swanson 
      To: evp-=
itc@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, July 08, 2006 11:41 PM
      Sub=
ject: [EVP-ITC] evp bit 


      Frank or anyone available?
      Can you c=
lean this up? When i clean it up i can hear something, but not getting it t=
o where i want it! The background noise is A. me breathing B. A pair of jea=
ns clanging in the dryer! lol


      amy



      http://groups.yahoo.com/=
group/EVP-ITC/
